	trigger_if = {

	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = buddhist }
		event_target:emf_global_buddhist_dummy = { is_heresy_of = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = jain }
		event_target:emf_global_jain_dummy = { is_heresy_of = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = taoist }
		event_target:emf_global_taoist_dummy = { is_heresy_of = FROM }
	}
}

true_religion_is_heresy_of_ROOT = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = catholic }
		event_target:emf_global_catholic_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = cathar }
		event_target:emf_global_cathar_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = fraticelli }
		event_target:emf_global_fraticelli_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = waldensian }
		event_target:emf_global_waldensian_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = lollard }
		event_target:emf_global_lollard_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = adoptionist }
		event_target:emf_global_adoptionist_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = arian }
		event_target:emf_global_arian_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = orthodox }
		event_target:emf_global_orthodox_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = bogomilist }
		event_target:emf_global_bogomilist_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = monothelite }
		event_target:emf_global_monothelite_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = iconoclast }
		event_target:emf_global_iconoclast_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = syriac }
		event_target:emf_global_syriac_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = maronite }
		event_target:emf_global_maronite_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = miaphysite }
		event_target:emf_global_miaphysite_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = monophysite }
		event_target:emf_global_monophysite_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = apostolic }
		event_target:emf_global_apostolic_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = paulician }
		event_target:emf_global_paulician_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = tondrakian }
		event_target:emf_global_tondrakian_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = nestorian }
		event_target:emf_global_nestorian_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = messalian }
		event_target:emf_global_messalian_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = sunni }
		event_target:emf_global_sunni_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = zikri }
		event_target:emf_global_zikri_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = mahdiyya }
		event_target:emf_global_mahdiyya_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = nabawiyya }
		event_target:emf_global_nabawiyya_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = ibadi }
		event_target:emf_global_ibadi_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = kharijite }
		event_target:emf_global_kharijite_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = haruri }
		event_target:emf_global_haruri_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {

		event_target:emf_global_shiite_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {

		event_target:emf_global_waqifi_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = zaydi }
		event_target:emf_global_zaydi_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = hurufi }
		event_target:emf_global_hurufi_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = ismaili }
		event_target:emf_global_ismaili_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = druze }
		event_target:emf_global_druze_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }

	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = qarmatian }
		event_target:emf_global_qarmatian_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = norse_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_norse_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }

	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = norse_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_norse_pagan_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = tengri_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_tengri_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = tengri_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_tengri_pagan_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = baltic_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_baltic_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }

	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = baltic_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_baltic_pagan_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }

		limit = { true_religion = finnish_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_finnish_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }

	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = finnish_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_finnish_pagan_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {

		event_target:emf_global_aztec_reformed_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = aztec }
		event_target:emf_global_aztec_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }

	trigger_else_if = {

	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = slavic_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_slavic_pagan_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }

	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = west_african_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_west_african_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }

	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = west_african_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_west_african_pagan_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = zun_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_zun_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = zun_pagan }

	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = hellenic_pagan_reformed }

	trigger_else_if = {

	trigger_else_if = {

	trigger_else_if = {

	trigger_else_if = {

		event_target:emf_global_mazdaki_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {

		event_target:emf_global_zurvanist_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = manichean }
		event_target:emf_global_manichean_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = mandaean }
		event_target:emf_global_mandaean_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = yazidi }
		event_target:emf_global_yazidi_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = khurmazta }
		event_target:emf_global_khurmazta_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = jewish }
		event_target:emf_global_jewish_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = samaritan }
		event_target:emf_global_samaritan_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = karaite }
		event_target:emf_global_karaite_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = hindu }
		event_target:emf_global_hindu_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = buddhist }
		event_target:emf_global_buddhist_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = jain }
		event_target:emf_global_jain_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = taoist }
		event_target:emf_global_taoist_dummy = { is_heresy_of = ROOT }
	}
}

true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = catholic }
		event_target:emf_global_catholic_dummy = { is_heresy_of = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = cathar }
		event_target:emf_global_cathar_dummy = { is_heresy_of = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = fraticelli }
		event_target:emf_global_fraticelli_dummy = { is_heresy_of = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = waldensian }
		event_target:emf_global_waldensian_dummy = { is_heresy_of = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = lollard }
		event_target:emf_global_lollard_dummy = { is_heresy_of = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = adoptionist }
		event_target:emf_global_adoptionist_dummy = { is_heresy_of = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = arian }
		event_target:emf_global_arian_dummy = { is_heresy_of = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = orthodox }
		event_target:emf_global_orthodox_dummy = { is_heresy_of = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = bogomilist }
		event_target:emf_global_bogomilist_dummy = { is_heresy_of = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = monothelite }
		event_target:emf_global_monothelite_dummy = { is_heresy_of = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = iconoclast }
		event_target:emf_global_iconoclast_dummy = { is_heresy_of = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = syriac }
		event_target:emf_global_syriac_dummy = { is_heresy_of = PREVPREV }

	trigger_else_if = {

		event_target:emf_global_maronite_dummy = { is_heresy_of = PREVPREV }

		event_target:emf_global_miaphysite_dummy = { is_heresy_of = PREVPREV }

	trigger_else_if = {

		event_target:emf_global_monophysite_dummy = { is_heresy_of = PREVPREV }

		event_target:emf_global_bon_reformed_dummy = { is_heresy_of = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = bon }
		event_target:emf_global_bon_dummy = { is_heresy_of = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = zoroastrian }
		event_target:emf_global_zoroastrian_dummy = { is_heresy_of = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = mazdaki }
		event_target:emf_global_mazdaki_dummy = { is_heresy_of = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = zurvanist }
		event_target:emf_global_zurvanist_dummy = { is_heresy_of = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = manichean }
		event_target:emf_global_manichean_dummy = { is_heresy_of = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = mandaean }
		event_target:emf_global_mandaean_dummy = { is_heresy_of = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = yazidi }
		event_target:emf_global_yazidi_dummy = { is_heresy_of = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = khurmazta }
		event_target:emf_global_khurmazta_dummy = { is_heresy_of = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = jewish }
		event_target:emf_global_jewish_dummy = { is_heresy_of = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = samaritan }
		event_target:emf_global_samaritan_dummy = { is_heresy_of = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = karaite }
		event_target:emf_global_karaite_dummy = { is_heresy_of = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = hindu }
		event_target:emf_global_hindu_dummy = { is_heresy_of = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = buddhist }
		event_target:emf_global_buddhist_dummy = { is_heresy_of = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = jain }
		event_target:emf_global_jain_dummy = { is_heresy_of = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = taoist }
		event_target:emf_global_taoist_dummy = { is_heresy_of = PREVPREV }
	}
}

true_religion_is_heresy_of_target_ruler = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = catholic }
		event_target:emf_global_catholic_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = cathar }
		event_target:emf_global_cathar_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = fraticelli }
		event_target:emf_global_fraticelli_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = waldensian }
		event_target:emf_global_waldensian_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = lollard }
		event_target:emf_global_lollard_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = adoptionist }
		event_target:emf_global_adoptionist_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = arian }
		event_target:emf_global_arian_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = orthodox }
		event_target:emf_global_orthodox_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = bogomilist }
		event_target:emf_global_bogomilist_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = monothelite }
		event_target:emf_global_monothelite_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = iconoclast }
		event_target:emf_global_iconoclast_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = syriac }
		event_target:emf_global_syriac_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = maronite }
		event_target:emf_global_maronite_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = miaphysite }
		event_target:emf_global_miaphysite_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = monophysite }
		event_target:emf_global_monophysite_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = apostolic }
		event_target:emf_global_apostolic_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = paulician }
		event_target:emf_global_paulician_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = tondrakian }
		event_target:emf_global_tondrakian_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = nestorian }
		event_target:emf_global_nestorian_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = messalian }
		event_target:emf_global_messalian_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = sunni }
		event_target:emf_global_sunni_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = zikri }
		event_target:emf_global_zikri_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = mahdiyya }
		event_target:emf_global_mahdiyya_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = nabawiyya }
		event_target:emf_global_nabawiyya_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = ibadi }
		event_target:emf_global_ibadi_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = kharijite }
		event_target:emf_global_kharijite_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = haruri }
		event_target:emf_global_haruri_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = shiite }
		event_target:emf_global_shiite_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = waqifi }
		event_target:emf_global_waqifi_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = zaydi }
		event_target:emf_global_zaydi_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = hurufi }
		event_target:emf_global_hurufi_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = ismaili }
		event_target:emf_global_ismaili_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = druze }
		event_target:emf_global_druze_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = qarmatian }
		event_target:emf_global_qarmatian_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = norse_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_norse_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = norse_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_norse_pagan_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = tengri_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_tengri_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = tengri_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_tengri_pagan_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = baltic_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_baltic_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = baltic_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_baltic_pagan_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = finnish_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_finnish_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = finnish_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_finnish_pagan_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = aztec_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_aztec_reformed_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = aztec }
		event_target:emf_global_aztec_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = slavic_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_slavic_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = slavic_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_slavic_pagan_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = west_african_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_west_african_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = west_african_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_west_african_pagan_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = zun_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_zun_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = zun_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_zun_pagan_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = hellenic_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_hellenic_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = hellenic_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_hellenic_pagan_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = bon_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_bon_reformed_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = bon }
		event_target:emf_global_bon_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = zoroastrian }
		event_target:emf_global_zoroastrian_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = mazdaki }
		event_target:emf_global_mazdaki_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = zurvanist }
		event_target:emf_global_zurvanist_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = manichean }
		event_target:emf_global_manichean_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = mandaean }
		event_target:emf_global_mandaean_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = yazidi }
		event_target:emf_global_yazidi_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = khurmazta }
		event_target:emf_global_khurmazta_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = jewish }
		event_target:emf_global_jewish_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = samaritan }
		event_target:emf_global_samaritan_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = karaite }
		event_target:emf_global_karaite_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = hindu }
		event_target:emf_global_hindu_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = buddhist }
		event_target:emf_global_buddhist_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = jain }
		event_target:emf_global_jain_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = taoist }
		event_target:emf_global_taoist_dummy = { is_heresy_of = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
}

true_religion_is_parent_religion_FROM = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = catholic }
		event_target:emf_global_catholic_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = cathar }
		event_target:emf_global_cathar_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = fraticelli }
		event_target:emf_global_fraticelli_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = waldensian }
		event_target:emf_global_waldensian_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = lollard }
		event_target:emf_global_lollard_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = adoptionist }
		event_target:emf_global_adoptionist_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = arian }
		event_target:emf_global_arian_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = orthodox }
		event_target:emf_global_orthodox_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = bogomilist }
		event_target:emf_global_bogomilist_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = monothelite }
		event_target:emf_global_monothelite_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = iconoclast }
		event_target:emf_global_iconoclast_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = syriac }
		event_target:emf_global_syriac_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = maronite }
		event_target:emf_global_maronite_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = miaphysite }
		event_target:emf_global_miaphysite_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = monophysite }
		event_target:emf_global_monophysite_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = apostolic }
		event_target:emf_global_apostolic_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = paulician }
		event_target:emf_global_paulician_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = tondrakian }
		event_target:emf_global_tondrakian_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = nestorian }
		event_target:emf_global_nestorian_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = messalian }
		event_target:emf_global_messalian_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = sunni }
		event_target:emf_global_sunni_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = zikri }
		event_target:emf_global_zikri_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = mahdiyya }
		event_target:emf_global_mahdiyya_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = nabawiyya }
		event_target:emf_global_nabawiyya_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = ibadi }
		event_target:emf_global_ibadi_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = kharijite }
		event_target:emf_global_kharijite_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = haruri }
		event_target:emf_global_haruri_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = shiite }
		event_target:emf_global_shiite_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = waqifi }
		event_target:emf_global_waqifi_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = zaydi }
		event_target:emf_global_zaydi_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = hurufi }
		event_target:emf_global_hurufi_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = ismaili }
		event_target:emf_global_ismaili_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = druze }
		event_target:emf_global_druze_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = qarmatian }
		event_target:emf_global_qarmatian_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = norse_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_norse_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = norse_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_norse_pagan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = tengri_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_tengri_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = tengri_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_tengri_pagan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = baltic_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_baltic_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = baltic_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_baltic_pagan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = finnish_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_finnish_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = finnish_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_finnish_pagan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = aztec_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_aztec_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = aztec }
		event_target:emf_global_aztec_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = slavic_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_slavic_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = slavic_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_slavic_pagan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = west_african_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_west_african_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = west_african_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_west_african_pagan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = zun_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_zun_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = zun_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_zun_pagan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = hellenic_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_hellenic_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = hellenic_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_hellenic_pagan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = bon_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_bon_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = bon }
		event_target:emf_global_bon_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = zoroastrian }
		event_target:emf_global_zoroastrian_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = mazdaki }
		event_target:emf_global_mazdaki_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = zurvanist }
		event_target:emf_global_zurvanist_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = manichean }
		event_target:emf_global_manichean_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = mandaean }
		event_target:emf_global_mandaean_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = yazidi }
		event_target:emf_global_yazidi_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = khurmazta }
		event_target:emf_global_khurmazta_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = jewish }
		event_target:emf_global_jewish_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = samaritan }
		event_target:emf_global_samaritan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = karaite }
		event_target:emf_global_karaite_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = hindu }
		event_target:emf_global_hindu_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = buddhist }
		event_target:emf_global_buddhist_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = jain }
		event_target:emf_global_jain_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = taoist }
		event_target:emf_global_taoist_dummy = { is_parent_religion = FROM }
	}
}

true_religion_is_parent_religion_ROOT = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = catholic }
		event_target:emf_global_catholic_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = cathar }
		event_target:emf_global_cathar_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = fraticelli }
		event_target:emf_global_fraticelli_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = waldensian }
		event_target:emf_global_waldensian_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = lollard }
		event_target:emf_global_lollard_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = adoptionist }
		event_target:emf_global_adoptionist_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = arian }
		event_target:emf_global_arian_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = orthodox }
		event_target:emf_global_orthodox_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = bogomilist }
		event_target:emf_global_bogomilist_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = monothelite }
		event_target:emf_global_monothelite_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = iconoclast }
		event_target:emf_global_iconoclast_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = syriac }
		event_target:emf_global_syriac_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = maronite }
		event_target:emf_global_maronite_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = miaphysite }
		event_target:emf_global_miaphysite_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = monophysite }
		event_target:emf_global_monophysite_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = apostolic }
		event_target:emf_global_apostolic_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = paulician }
		event_target:emf_global_paulician_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = tondrakian }
		event_target:emf_global_tondrakian_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = nestorian }
		event_target:emf_global_nestorian_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = messalian }
		event_target:emf_global_messalian_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = sunni }
		event_target:emf_global_sunni_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = zikri }
		event_target:emf_global_zikri_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = mahdiyya }
		event_target:emf_global_mahdiyya_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = nabawiyya }
		event_target:emf_global_nabawiyya_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = ibadi }
		event_target:emf_global_ibadi_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = kharijite }
		event_target:emf_global_kharijite_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = haruri }
		event_target:emf_global_haruri_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = shiite }
		event_target:emf_global_shiite_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = waqifi }
		event_target:emf_global_waqifi_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = zaydi }
		event_target:emf_global_zaydi_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = hurufi }
		event_target:emf_global_hurufi_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = ismaili }
		event_target:emf_global_ismaili_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = druze }
		event_target:emf_global_druze_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = qarmatian }
		event_target:emf_global_qarmatian_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = norse_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_norse_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = norse_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_norse_pagan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = tengri_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_tengri_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = tengri_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_tengri_pagan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = baltic_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_baltic_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = baltic_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_baltic_pagan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = finnish_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_finnish_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = finnish_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_finnish_pagan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = aztec_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_aztec_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = aztec }
		event_target:emf_global_aztec_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = slavic_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_slavic_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = slavic_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_slavic_pagan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = west_african_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_west_african_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = west_african_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_west_african_pagan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = zun_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_zun_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = zun_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_zun_pagan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = hellenic_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_hellenic_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = hellenic_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_hellenic_pagan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = bon_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_bon_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = bon }
		event_target:emf_global_bon_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = zoroastrian }
		event_target:emf_global_zoroastrian_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = mazdaki }
		event_target:emf_global_mazdaki_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = zurvanist }
		event_target:emf_global_zurvanist_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = manichean }
		event_target:emf_global_manichean_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = mandaean }
		event_target:emf_global_mandaean_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = yazidi }
		event_target:emf_global_yazidi_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = khurmazta }
		event_target:emf_global_khurmazta_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = jewish }
		event_target:emf_global_jewish_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = samaritan }
		event_target:emf_global_samaritan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = karaite }
		event_target:emf_global_karaite_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = hindu }
		event_target:emf_global_hindu_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = buddhist }
		event_target:emf_global_buddhist_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = jain }
		event_target:emf_global_jain_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = taoist }
		event_target:emf_global_taoist_dummy = { is_parent_religion = ROOT }
	}
}

true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = catholic }
		event_target:emf_global_catholic_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = cathar }
		event_target:emf_global_cathar_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = fraticelli }
		event_target:emf_global_fraticelli_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = waldensian }
		event_target:emf_global_waldensian_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = lollard }
		event_target:emf_global_lollard_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = adoptionist }
		event_target:emf_global_adoptionist_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = arian }
		event_target:emf_global_arian_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = orthodox }
		event_target:emf_global_orthodox_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = bogomilist }
		event_target:emf_global_bogomilist_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = monothelite }
		event_target:emf_global_monothelite_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = iconoclast }
		event_target:emf_global_iconoclast_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = syriac }
		event_target:emf_global_syriac_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = maronite }
		event_target:emf_global_maronite_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = miaphysite }
		event_target:emf_global_miaphysite_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = monophysite }
		event_target:emf_global_monophysite_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = apostolic }
		event_target:emf_global_apostolic_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = paulician }
		event_target:emf_global_paulician_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = tondrakian }
		event_target:emf_global_tondrakian_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = nestorian }
		event_target:emf_global_nestorian_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }

	trigger_else_if = {

	trigger_else_if = {

	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = waqifi }
		event_target:emf_global_waqifi_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }

	trigger_else_if = {

	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = hurufi }
		event_target:emf_global_hurufi_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = ismaili }

	trigger_else_if = {

	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = qarmatian }
		event_target:emf_global_qarmatian_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }

	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = norse_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_norse_pagan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }

	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = tengri_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_tengri_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = tengri_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_tengri_pagan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = baltic_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_baltic_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = baltic_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_baltic_pagan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = finnish_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_finnish_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = finnish_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_finnish_pagan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = aztec_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_aztec_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = aztec }
		event_target:emf_global_aztec_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = slavic_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_slavic_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = slavic_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_slavic_pagan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = west_african_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_west_african_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = west_african_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_west_african_pagan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = zun_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_zun_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = zun_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_zun_pagan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = hellenic_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_hellenic_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = hellenic_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_hellenic_pagan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = bon_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_bon_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = bon }
		event_target:emf_global_bon_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = zoroastrian }
		event_target:emf_global_zoroastrian_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = mazdaki }
		event_target:emf_global_mazdaki_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = zurvanist }
		event_target:emf_global_zurvanist_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = manichean }
		event_target:emf_global_manichean_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = mandaean }
		event_target:emf_global_mandaean_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = yazidi }
		event_target:emf_global_yazidi_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = khurmazta }
		event_target:emf_global_khurmazta_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = jewish }
		event_target:emf_global_jewish_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = samaritan }
		event_target:emf_global_samaritan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = karaite }
		event_target:emf_global_karaite_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = hindu }
		event_target:emf_global_hindu_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = buddhist }
		event_target:emf_global_buddhist_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = jain }
		event_target:emf_global_jain_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = taoist }
		event_target:emf_global_taoist_dummy = { is_parent_religion = PREVPREV }
	}
}

true_religion_is_parent_religion_target_ruler = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = catholic }
		event_target:emf_global_catholic_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = cathar }
		event_target:emf_global_cathar_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = fraticelli }
		event_target:emf_global_fraticelli_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = waldensian }
		event_target:emf_global_waldensian_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = lollard }
		event_target:emf_global_lollard_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = adoptionist }
		event_target:emf_global_adoptionist_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = arian }
		event_target:emf_global_arian_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = orthodox }
		event_target:emf_global_orthodox_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = bogomilist }
		event_target:emf_global_bogomilist_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = monothelite }
		event_target:emf_global_monothelite_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = iconoclast }
		event_target:emf_global_iconoclast_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = syriac }
		event_target:emf_global_syriac_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = maronite }
		event_target:emf_global_maronite_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = miaphysite }
		event_target:emf_global_miaphysite_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = monophysite }
		event_target:emf_global_monophysite_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = apostolic }
		event_target:emf_global_apostolic_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = paulician }
		event_target:emf_global_paulician_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = tondrakian }
		event_target:emf_global_tondrakian_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = nestorian }
		event_target:emf_global_nestorian_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = messalian }
		event_target:emf_global_messalian_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = sunni }
		event_target:emf_global_sunni_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = zikri }
		event_target:emf_global_zikri_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = mahdiyya }
		event_target:emf_global_mahdiyya_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = nabawiyya }
		event_target:emf_global_nabawiyya_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = ibadi }
		event_target:emf_global_ibadi_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = kharijite }
		event_target:emf_global_kharijite_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = haruri }
		event_target:emf_global_haruri_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = shiite }
		event_target:emf_global_shiite_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = waqifi }
		event_target:emf_global_waqifi_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = zaydi }
		event_target:emf_global_zaydi_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = hurufi }
		event_target:emf_global_hurufi_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = ismaili }
		event_target:emf_global_ismaili_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = druze }
		event_target:emf_global_druze_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = qarmatian }
		event_target:emf_global_qarmatian_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = norse_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_norse_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = norse_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_norse_pagan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = tengri_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_tengri_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = tengri_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_tengri_pagan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = baltic_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_baltic_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = baltic_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_baltic_pagan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = finnish_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_finnish_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = finnish_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_finnish_pagan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = aztec_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_aztec_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = aztec }
		event_target:emf_global_aztec_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = slavic_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_slavic_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = slavic_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_slavic_pagan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = west_african_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_west_african_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = west_african_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_west_african_pagan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = zun_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_zun_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = zun_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_zun_pagan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = hellenic_pagan_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_hellenic_pagan_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = hellenic_pagan }
		event_target:emf_global_hellenic_pagan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = bon_reformed }
		event_target:emf_global_bon_reformed_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = bon }
		event_target:emf_global_bon_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = zoroastrian }
		event_target:emf_global_zoroastrian_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = mazdaki }
		event_target:emf_global_mazdaki_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = zurvanist }
		event_target:emf_global_zurvanist_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = manichean }
		event_target:emf_global_manichean_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = mandaean }
		event_target:emf_global_mandaean_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = yazidi }
		event_target:emf_global_yazidi_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = khurmazta }
		event_target:emf_global_khurmazta_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = jewish }
		event_target:emf_global_jewish_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = samaritan }
		event_target:emf_global_samaritan_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = karaite }
		event_target:emf_global_karaite_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = hindu }
		event_target:emf_global_hindu_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = buddhist }
		event_target:emf_global_buddhist_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = jain }
		event_target:emf_global_jain_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { true_religion = taoist }
		event_target:emf_global_taoist_dummy = { is_parent_religion = event_target:target_ruler }
	}
}

true_religion_is_heresy_of_FROM_true_religion = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = catholic } }
		event_target:emf_global_catholic_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = cathar } }
		event_target:emf_global_cathar_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = fraticelli } }
		event_target:emf_global_fraticelli_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = waldensian } }
		event_target:emf_global_waldensian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = lollard } }
		event_target:emf_global_lollard_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = adoptionist } }
		event_target:emf_global_adoptionist_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = arian } }
		event_target:emf_global_arian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = orthodox } }
		event_target:emf_global_orthodox_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = bogomilist } }
		event_target:emf_global_bogomilist_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = monothelite } }
		event_target:emf_global_monothelite_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = iconoclast } }
		event_target:emf_global_iconoclast_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = syriac } }
		event_target:emf_global_syriac_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = maronite } }
		event_target:emf_global_maronite_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = miaphysite } }
		event_target:emf_global_miaphysite_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = monophysite } }
		event_target:emf_global_monophysite_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = apostolic } }
		event_target:emf_global_apostolic_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = paulician } }
		event_target:emf_global_paulician_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = tondrakian } }
		event_target:emf_global_tondrakian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = nestorian } }
		event_target:emf_global_nestorian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = messalian } }
		event_target:emf_global_messalian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = sunni } }
		event_target:emf_global_sunni_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = zikri } }
		event_target:emf_global_zikri_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = mahdiyya } }
		event_target:emf_global_mahdiyya_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = nabawiyya } }
		event_target:emf_global_nabawiyya_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = ibadi } }
		event_target:emf_global_ibadi_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {

		event_target:emf_global_hindu_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }

		event_target:emf_global_buddhist_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = jain } }
		event_target:emf_global_jain_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = taoist } }
		event_target:emf_global_taoist_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
}

true_religion_is_heresy_of_ROOT_true_religion = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = catholic } }
		event_target:emf_global_catholic_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = cathar } }
		event_target:emf_global_cathar_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = fraticelli } }
		event_target:emf_global_fraticelli_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = waldensian } }
		event_target:emf_global_waldensian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = lollard } }
		event_target:emf_global_lollard_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = adoptionist } }
		event_target:emf_global_adoptionist_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = arian } }
		event_target:emf_global_arian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = orthodox } }
		event_target:emf_global_orthodox_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = bogomilist } }
		event_target:emf_global_bogomilist_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = monothelite } }
		event_target:emf_global_monothelite_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = iconoclast } }
		event_target:emf_global_iconoclast_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = syriac } }
		event_target:emf_global_syriac_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = maronite } }
		event_target:emf_global_maronite_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = miaphysite } }
		event_target:emf_global_miaphysite_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = monophysite } }
		event_target:emf_global_monophysite_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }

		event_target:emf_global_paulician_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = tondrakian } }
		event_target:emf_global_tondrakian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = nestorian } }
		event_target:emf_global_nestorian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {

		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = manichean } }
		event_target:emf_global_manichean_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = mandaean } }
		event_target:emf_global_mandaean_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = yazidi } }
		event_target:emf_global_yazidi_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = khurmazta } }
		event_target:emf_global_khurmazta_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = jewish } }
		event_target:emf_global_jewish_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = samaritan } }
		event_target:emf_global_samaritan_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = karaite } }
		event_target:emf_global_karaite_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = hindu } }
		event_target:emf_global_hindu_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = buddhist } }
		event_target:emf_global_buddhist_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = jain } }
		event_target:emf_global_jain_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = taoist } }
		event_target:emf_global_taoist_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
}

true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV_true_religion = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = catholic } }
		event_target:emf_global_catholic_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = cathar } }
		event_target:emf_global_cathar_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = fraticelli } }
		event_target:emf_global_fraticelli_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = waldensian } }
		event_target:emf_global_waldensian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = lollard } }
		event_target:emf_global_lollard_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = adoptionist } }
		event_target:emf_global_adoptionist_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = arian } }
		event_target:emf_global_arian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = orthodox } }
		event_target:emf_global_orthodox_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = bogomilist } }
		event_target:emf_global_bogomilist_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = monothelite } }
		event_target:emf_global_monothelite_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = iconoclast } }
		event_target:emf_global_iconoclast_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = syriac } }
		event_target:emf_global_syriac_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = maronite } }
		event_target:emf_global_maronite_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = miaphysite } }
		event_target:emf_global_miaphysite_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = monophysite } }
		event_target:emf_global_monophysite_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = apostolic } }
		event_target:emf_global_apostolic_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}

		event_target:emf_global_paulician_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }

		event_target:emf_global_tondrakian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = nestorian } }
		event_target:emf_global_nestorian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }

		event_target:emf_global_druze_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = qarmatian } }
		event_target:emf_global_qarmatian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = norse_pagan_reformed } }

		event_target:emf_global_tengri_pagan_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = baltic_pagan_reformed } }
		event_target:emf_global_baltic_pagan_reformed_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }

		event_target:emf_global_aztec_reformed_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }

		event_target:emf_global_aztec_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }

		event_target:emf_global_yazidi_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }

		event_target:emf_global_jewish_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {

		event_target:emf_global_samaritan_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }

	trigger_else_if = {

		event_target:emf_global_karaite_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
