		event_target:emf_global_jain_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = taoist } }
		event_target:emf_global_taoist_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
}

true_religion_is_heresy_of_target_ruler_true_religion = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = catholic } }
		event_target:emf_global_catholic_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = cathar } }
		event_target:emf_global_cathar_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = fraticelli } }
		event_target:emf_global_fraticelli_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = waldensian } }
		event_target:emf_global_waldensian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = lollard } }
		event_target:emf_global_lollard_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = adoptionist } }
		event_target:emf_global_adoptionist_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = arian } }
		event_target:emf_global_arian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = orthodox } }
		event_target:emf_global_orthodox_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = bogomilist } }
		event_target:emf_global_bogomilist_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = monothelite } }
		event_target:emf_global_monothelite_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = iconoclast } }
		event_target:emf_global_iconoclast_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = syriac } }
		event_target:emf_global_syriac_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = maronite } }
		event_target:emf_global_maronite_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = miaphysite } }
		event_target:emf_global_miaphysite_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = monophysite } }
		event_target:emf_global_monophysite_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = apostolic } }
		event_target:emf_global_apostolic_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = paulician } }
		event_target:emf_global_paulician_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = tondrakian } }
		event_target:emf_global_tondrakian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = nestorian } }
		event_target:emf_global_nestorian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = messalian } }
		event_target:emf_global_messalian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = sunni } }
		event_target:emf_global_sunni_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = zikri } }
		event_target:emf_global_zikri_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = mahdiyya } }
		event_target:emf_global_mahdiyya_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = nabawiyya } }
		event_target:emf_global_nabawiyya_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = ibadi } }
		event_target:emf_global_ibadi_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = kharijite } }
		event_target:emf_global_kharijite_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = haruri } }
		event_target:emf_global_haruri_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = shiite } }
		event_target:emf_global_shiite_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {

		event_target:emf_global_jewish_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }

		event_target:emf_global_samaritan_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }

		event_target:emf_global_hindu_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }

		event_target:emf_global_buddhist_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = jain } }
		event_target:emf_global_jain_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = taoist } }
		event_target:emf_global_taoist_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_heresy_of_PREV = yes } }
	}
}

true_religion_is_parent_religion_FROM_true_religion = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = catholic } }
		event_target:emf_global_catholic_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = cathar } }
		event_target:emf_global_cathar_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = fraticelli } }
		event_target:emf_global_fraticelli_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = waldensian } }
		event_target:emf_global_waldensian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = lollard } }
		event_target:emf_global_lollard_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = adoptionist } }
		event_target:emf_global_adoptionist_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = arian } }
		event_target:emf_global_arian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = orthodox } }
		event_target:emf_global_orthodox_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = bogomilist } }
		event_target:emf_global_bogomilist_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = monothelite } }
		event_target:emf_global_monothelite_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = iconoclast } }
		event_target:emf_global_iconoclast_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = syriac } }
		event_target:emf_global_syriac_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = maronite } }
		event_target:emf_global_maronite_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = miaphysite } }
		event_target:emf_global_miaphysite_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = monophysite } }
		event_target:emf_global_monophysite_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }

		event_target:emf_global_tondrakian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = nestorian } }
		event_target:emf_global_nestorian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = messalian } }
		event_target:emf_global_messalian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}

		event_target:emf_global_baltic_pagan_reformed_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }

		event_target:emf_global_hellenic_pagan_reformed_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }

	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = hellenic_pagan } }
		event_target:emf_global_hellenic_pagan_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = bon_reformed } }
		event_target:emf_global_bon_reformed_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = bon } }
		event_target:emf_global_bon_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = zoroastrian } }
		event_target:emf_global_zoroastrian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = mazdaki } }
		event_target:emf_global_mazdaki_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = zurvanist } }
		event_target:emf_global_zurvanist_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = manichean } }
		event_target:emf_global_manichean_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = mandaean } }
		event_target:emf_global_mandaean_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = yazidi } }
		event_target:emf_global_yazidi_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = khurmazta } }
		event_target:emf_global_khurmazta_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = jewish } }
		event_target:emf_global_jewish_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = samaritan } }
		event_target:emf_global_samaritan_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = karaite } }
		event_target:emf_global_karaite_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = hindu } }
		event_target:emf_global_hindu_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = buddhist } }
		event_target:emf_global_buddhist_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = jain } }
		event_target:emf_global_jain_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { true_religion = taoist } }
		event_target:emf_global_taoist_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
}

true_religion_is_parent_religion_ROOT_true_religion = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = catholic } }
		event_target:emf_global_catholic_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = cathar } }
		event_target:emf_global_cathar_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = fraticelli } }
		event_target:emf_global_fraticelli_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = waldensian } }
		event_target:emf_global_waldensian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = lollard } }
		event_target:emf_global_lollard_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = adoptionist } }
		event_target:emf_global_adoptionist_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = arian } }
		event_target:emf_global_arian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = orthodox } }
		event_target:emf_global_orthodox_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = bogomilist } }
		event_target:emf_global_bogomilist_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = monothelite } }
		event_target:emf_global_monothelite_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = iconoclast } }
		event_target:emf_global_iconoclast_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = syriac } }
		event_target:emf_global_syriac_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = maronite } }
		event_target:emf_global_maronite_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = miaphysite } }
		event_target:emf_global_miaphysite_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = monophysite } }
		event_target:emf_global_monophysite_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = apostolic } }
		event_target:emf_global_apostolic_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}

		event_target:emf_global_paulician_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }

		event_target:emf_global_tondrakian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }

		event_target:emf_global_nestorian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }

		event_target:emf_global_druze_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = qarmatian } }
		event_target:emf_global_qarmatian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = norse_pagan_reformed } }
		event_target:emf_global_norse_pagan_reformed_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }

		event_target:emf_global_norse_pagan_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }

		event_target:emf_global_tengri_pagan_reformed_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = tengri_pagan } }
		event_target:emf_global_tengri_pagan_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = baltic_pagan_reformed } }
		event_target:emf_global_baltic_pagan_reformed_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { true_religion = baltic_pagan } }
		event_target:emf_global_baltic_pagan_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }

	}

true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV_true_religion = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = catholic } }
		event_target:emf_global_catholic_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = cathar } }
		event_target:emf_global_cathar_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = fraticelli } }
		event_target:emf_global_fraticelli_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = waldensian } }
		event_target:emf_global_waldensian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = lollard } }
		event_target:emf_global_lollard_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = adoptionist } }
		event_target:emf_global_adoptionist_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = arian } }
		event_target:emf_global_arian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = orthodox } }
		event_target:emf_global_orthodox_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = bogomilist } }
		event_target:emf_global_bogomilist_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = monothelite } }
		event_target:emf_global_monothelite_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = iconoclast } }
		event_target:emf_global_iconoclast_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = syriac } }
		event_target:emf_global_syriac_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = maronite } }
		event_target:emf_global_maronite_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = miaphysite } }
		event_target:emf_global_miaphysite_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = monophysite } }
		event_target:emf_global_monophysite_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = apostolic } }
		event_target:emf_global_apostolic_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = paulician } }
		event_target:emf_global_paulician_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = tondrakian } }
		event_target:emf_global_tondrakian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = nestorian } }
		event_target:emf_global_nestorian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = messalian } }
		event_target:emf_global_messalian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = sunni } }
		event_target:emf_global_sunni_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = zikri } }
		event_target:emf_global_zikri_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = mahdiyya } }
		event_target:emf_global_mahdiyya_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { true_religion = nabawiyya } }

	}
}

true_religion_is_parent_religion_target_ruler_true_religion = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = catholic } }
		event_target:emf_global_catholic_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = cathar } }
		event_target:emf_global_cathar_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = fraticelli } }
		event_target:emf_global_fraticelli_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = waldensian } }
		event_target:emf_global_waldensian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = lollard } }
		event_target:emf_global_lollard_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = adoptionist } }
		event_target:emf_global_adoptionist_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = arian } }
		event_target:emf_global_arian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = orthodox } }
		event_target:emf_global_orthodox_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}

		event_target:emf_global_bogomilist_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }

	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = bon_reformed } }
		event_target:emf_global_bon_reformed_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = bon } }
		event_target:emf_global_bon_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = zoroastrian } }
		event_target:emf_global_zoroastrian_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = mazdaki } }
		event_target:emf_global_mazdaki_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = zurvanist } }
		event_target:emf_global_zurvanist_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = manichean } }
		event_target:emf_global_manichean_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = mandaean } }
		event_target:emf_global_mandaean_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = yazidi } }
		event_target:emf_global_yazidi_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = khurmazta } }
		event_target:emf_global_khurmazta_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = jewish } }
		event_target:emf_global_jewish_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = samaritan } }
		event_target:emf_global_samaritan_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = karaite } }
		event_target:emf_global_karaite_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = hindu } }
		event_target:emf_global_hindu_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = buddhist } }
		event_target:emf_global_buddhist_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = jain } }
		event_target:emf_global_jain_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { event_target:target_ruler = { true_religion = taoist } }
		event_target:emf_global_taoist_dummy = { PREV = { true_religion_is_parent_religion_PREV = yes } }
	}
}
